message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own a truly unique item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18,000. This is a great deal, considering its value to you is $15,000. I'm confident you'll love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value of this product, $18,000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable paying. I'm willing to pay $13,500 for it. What do you think?

Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your concerns about the price, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $16,000. This is a great compromise, considering the value it holds for you. What do you think?

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $16,000 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm happy to meet you at $14,500. This is a fair price considering the value I place on it and leaves some room for us both to feel good about the deal.

I understand your desire to meet in the middle, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go below $16,000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer you a deal at $15,800. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, but I think it's still a fair price considering the value the product holds for you. What do you think?

Alice, I'm still not quite there.  $15,800 is close, but I'm really hoping to get this under $15,500.  I'm willing to offer you $15,250.  This would be a great deal for both of us and would ensure a smooth transaction.

I understand your persistence, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go below $15,800. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer you a deal at $15,700. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, and I think it's still a fair price considering the value the product holds for you. What do you think?
